meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Paul Nelson Ariane Helou Keith Whitener Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6470.

div.div:
Keith Whitener game 8.
Paul Nelson game 1.

td.p: Paul Nelson, a Senate staff aide originally from Iowa City, Iowa
Ariane Helou, a graduate student of literature from Santa Cruz, California
Keith Whitener, a research chemist originally from Charlotte, North Carolina (whose 7-day cash winnings total $147,597)

tr.td: PYRAMIDS
WORDS THAT SHOULD RHYME
TRIOS
CROSBY
STILLS
NOSH

div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_DJ_6_5', 'clue_DJ_6_5_stuck', '(Alex Trebek stands by railroad tracks and delivers the clue.) I love the smell of this in the morning. It\'s a distillation of coal and wood tar, and for years and years, it has been the main preservative for wooden railroad ties. Don\'t say napalm')

a.title: Suggest a correction for this clue

tr.td: (Alex Trebek stands by railroad tracks and delivers the clue.) I love the smell of this in the morning. It's a distillation of coal and wood tar, and for years and years, it has been the main preservative for wooden railroad ties. Don't say napalm

div.h3: Scores at the end of the Double Jeopardy! Round:

tr.td: Keith
Ariane
Paul

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', '(Alex: Seismic Fault should\'ve led you to the West Coast somewhere.)
...
(Alex: [To Ariane] Did you go to school there?)
(Ariane: I did.)
(Alex: You did, oh, my gosh, you are correct. The Hayward Fault is just south of Berkeley.)
ArianeWho are the Cal Golden Bears? (Go Bears!)
$0
PaulWhat is Thanks, mom & dad
$0
KeithWhat is the Trojans?
$11,701
the Cal Golden Bears')

tr.td: COLLEGE FOOTBALL TEAM NICKNAMES

2nd place: $2,000
